name: Cashmere Parfait - #1
description:
Our reclaimed fibers are upcycled from used cashmere and silk commercially made sweaters. It's recycling at its best, turning something worn and ugly into something gorgeous and luxurious! Even better, reclaiming supports local charities since we find most of our materials at local thrift stores! Reclaimed fibers have all been washed twice and plied for ultimate softness.

Island Yarn Cashmere Parfait is 100% Cashmere, 350 yards/skein, and knits on a 5-7 as a dk/light worsted weight. Each skein is its own unique color scheme and stripes as you knit along.  Cashmere Parfait skeins are big enough for a small shawl or a scarf, but also great for cowls and sweaters - anything you want squished around your face and neck. Luxurious to knit with, you will love our reclaimed fibers!

name: Combo Fibers - 200 Yards - Three More More
description:
Combo Fibers are our delightfully changing hanks of many, many yarns.  They are crazy fun and engaging to knit with and easily make many one-skein projects (mobius, ruffle, lacey scarf, hat).  

These hanks are largely surprises and the pictures shown are just examples.  When you order, please include a color(s) preference (if it's unclear, I'll be in touch with you to make sure) and then sit back and be delighted!

Combo hanks are 200 yards each and are best on Size 10 - 19 needles.

name: Nimbus - 100% Merino Wool - Hot Tamale
description:
Nimbus is our new, super cuddly merino wool that's arrived just in time for that crisp fall chill in the air! Each 100 gram hank has 175 yards and is 100% Merino Wool. This yarn loves to be knit on Size US 7-9 to give you a great aran yarn perfect for sweaters, hats, scarves, and mittens.

Colorway:  Hot Tamale

name: Chesterfield - Merino/Silk - Melon Salsa
description:
Each hank of Chesterfield is 125 grams and 250 yards and knits at a worsted or Aran weight on size 7 - 9 needle. Chesterfield is single ply that is 50% Merino Wool and 50% Silk and so luscious to knit with, you won't want to ever stop using it and wearing it!

COLORWAY - Melon Salsa

COLORWAY - Blacklight

name: Velvet - 100% Superwash Merino - Pansy
description:
Velvet is our bulky weight, plied, superwash merino. It is super squishy and unbelievably soft. Perfect for all your instant gratification bulky weight needs it likes to be knit on at 10 to 13 needle and you can expect 2-3 stitches per inch with those needles. Each huggable hank has 4 ounces and 100 yards. Hats, scarves, mittens, sweaters, blankets...it is great for so many things there is only one thing to do...cast on!

COLORWAY - Pansy

name: Pagoda Worsted - SPECIAL ORDER
description:
Pagoda Worsted is the same delightful blend of 70% Merino Wool and 30% Bamboo that you have come to know and love in Pagoda, but in a worsted weight.  It is perfect for blankets, sweaters, baby items, and more!
Super soft with delightfully subtle color variations, Pagoda is a yarn you will want to use over and over again!

Scroll through the pictures and include your colorway choice (s) in the notes of your paypal payment. It's that easy! Special orders take 2-3 weeks for delivery. I'll email you when it is ready to ship!

name: Rivulet - SPECIAL ORDER
description:
Rivulet is our plied sport weight single superwash merino. It is super squishy and unbelievably soft...you can't imagine how nice it is to knit with! Perfect for any project it likes to be knit from a 3 to 5 and you can expect 5-6 stitches per inch with those needles. Each huggable hank has 4 ounces and 385 yards.  It's great for any project I can think of from shawls to hats to socks!

Scroll through the pictures and include your colorway choice (s) in the notes of your paypal payment. It's that easy! Special orders take 2-3 weeks for delivery. I'll email you when it is ready to ship!

name: River - SPECIAL ORDER
description:
River is our worsted weight, plied, superwash merino. It is super squishy and unbelievably soft. Perfect for all your worsted weight needs it likes to be knit from a 6 to 8 and you can expect 4-5 stitches per inch with those needles. Each huggable hank has 100 grams and 225 yards. Hats, scarves, mittens, sweaters, blankets...it is great for so many things there is only one thing to do...cast on!

Scroll through the pictures and include your colorway choice (s) in the notes of your paypal payment. It's that easy! Special orders take 2-3 weeks for delivery. I'll email you when it is ready to ship!

name: Papyrus - SPECIAL ORDER
description:
Papyrus is our deep, rich fingering weight. It's 8 super fine plies of superwash merino make it stronger than most fingering weights and a dream to dye. It makes friends with color like nothing I have ever seen! Each hank is 100 grams and has 420 yards. I was delighted to find this gem and I know you will be too!

Scroll through the pictures and include your colorway choice (s) in the notes of your paypal payment. It's that easy! Special orders take 2-3 weeks for delivery. I'll email you when it is ready to ship!

name: Lush Silk Lace - SPECIAL ORDER
description:
Lush Silk Lace is such a clear demonstration of why the interwebs aren't quite right. you NEED to feel this. Really, you need to roll around in it, but alas I don't think stroking your screen is going to yield the same results.  Each hank of Lush Silk is 100 grams and is 1150 yards of silk laceweight heaven. Perfect for luxurious shawls, Lush Silk Lace is 100% plied silk.

Scroll through the pictures and include your colorway choice (s) in the notes of your paypal payment. It's that easy! Special orders take 2-3 weeks for delivery. I'll email you when it is ready to ship!

name: Noki - SPECIAL ORDER
description:
Noki is our delectable merino/silk blend hand-dyed yarn. A plied fingering weight with 50% Merino Wool and 50% Silk, Noki is a delight to feel, knit with, and wear! Noki is perfect for shawls, scarves, cowls, hats, and lighter weight sweaters...you won't ever want to stop knitting with it! Each hank of Noki has 320 yards, perfect for your next scarf or cowl!

Scroll through the pictures and include your colorway choice (s) in the notes of your paypal payment. It's that easy! Special orders take 2-3 weeks for delivery. I'll email you when it is ready to ship!
